text.front:
arXiv:0810.2401v1 [hep-ex]
14 Oct 2008
Radiative and Leptonic B-meson Decays from the B-factories
John Walsh a ,
on behalf of
the BABAR and Belle Collaborations
a Istituto Nazionale di Fisica Nucleare
Largo Pontecorvo, 3
Pisa, Italy
Radiative and leptonic decays of B-mesons represent an excellent laboratory for the search for New Physics. I
present here recent results on radiative and leptonic decays from the Belle and BABAR collaborations.
